name: Gerald's Cats
description:
You are tasked to find and return all of Gerald's cats! Complete various tasks in order to find the cats c:

--

Controls:

WASD to move

MOUSE to look around

SPACE to jump

LEFT CLICK to interact

--

WARNING: Do not click the cats more than once or else you will break the game :(

--

Avg playtime: 10-20min

My best time: 01:38
